title: People Data Analyst
description:
What You'll Do

This role, in the DX Data & Analytics Organization, will be responsible for helping execute on our People Data strategy that delivers outstanding solutions to the business, based on a deep understanding of customer needs, industry trends, and available offerings.

As well as helping drive our data priorities and initiatives, this position is a collaborative role, providing support for analytics and research into our data structure, maintenance, performance, and modelling.

• Knowledge of system & data architecture, and the ability to apply them

• You are a system thinker with strong interpersonal skills, presentation skills, and trouble shooting and problem solving skills
• You are proficient in delivering analytic and project management support, through all data quality initiatives
• You possess the capability to identify, analyze and address problems, to resolve issues whenever possible in way that minimizes negative impact and risk to the organization.

Why Cisco

We’re helping those who work in the health service to connect with patients and each other; schools, colleges and universities to teach in even the most challenging of times. We’re helping businesses of all shapes and size to connect with their employees and customers in new ways, providing people with access to the digital skills they need and connecting the most remote parts of the world – whether through 5G, or otherwise.

We tackle whatever challenges come our way. We have each other’s backs, we recognize our accomplishments, and we grow together. We are thrilled to announce that we are sourcing for a person who will join us as Senior Market Analyst!

YOU AND YOUR TEAM

The Refinitiv Evaluated Pricing Service is an independent, global evaluated pricing source covering over 2.6 million fixed income securities and derivatives. Coverage spans all major financial markets and prices are available at multiple times daily. Our evaluated prices, which provide detailed transparency and market insight, are crafted to support asset managers, custodian banks, mutual funds, investment banks, accounting firms, and financial research providers.

You will be part of the REPS Derivatives team based in Gdynia providing evaluations across variety of OTC derivative instruments. The successful candidate will manage the market data workflow that feeds tools deriving end-of-day evaluations. Your responsibilities will include sourcing of exchange and contributed data (asset classes such... as equity, money markets, interest rate, credit) and ensuring high quality of data through QA checks. You will take part in maintenance activities of database of underlying instruments and will participate in projects aiming at improving the market data collection processes. Most importantly you will provide support, market data expertise and will work closely with team members involved in evaluating clients’ portfolios.

• Monitor daily and intraday market data snaps and perform QA checks
